definitions.definition: A hard gelatin made by boiling bones and hides, used in solution as an adhesive; or any sticky adhesive substance.
Anything that binds two things or people together.
To join or attach something using glue.
definitions.example: I need to glue the chair-leg back into place.

definitions.definition: To cause something to adhere closely to; to follow attentively.
definitions.example: His eyes were glued to the screen.
